content: उपहित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Placed in or upon, deposited; <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; °मध्यमस्वर <ls>M. 1. 21</ls> taken as a basis. {@--2@} Preceded by. {@--3@} Joined, mixed, connected with. {@--4@} Possessed of; <ls>Śi. 16. 7.</ls> {@--5@} Ready; deputed to act as a spy. {@--6@} Given, bestowed.
